import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/DropMenu.css' import userFrame from '../icons/frame.png' import downarrw from '../icons/arrow-down.png' export default function DropMenu(props ){ const title=props.title const [options, setOptions]=useState(props.options.map(option=>(
  • props.handleChange({option}) }>{option}
    • ))) return(
    {title}
    {props.showRoleMenu &&
      {options}
    }
    ) }
